text: The following is a list of notable artists who play, compose, have played, or have composed albums or pieces of drone music or drone doom. *Oren Ambarchi *Ellen Arkbro *Kenneth Atchley *Aidan Baker *Bass Communion *Biosphere *Birchville Cat Motel *The Black Angels *Black Boned Angel *Boards Of Canada *Bohren & der Club of Gore *Boris *Bowery Electric *Bull of Heaven *Burning Witch *Terry Burrows *Sheila Chandra *Tony Conrad *Sarah Davachi *Andrew Deutsch *Alio Die *Diesel Guitar *Dronalarium *Kyle Bobby Dunn *Earth *Jason van Wyk *Jean-Claude Éloy *Jóhann Jóhannsson *Eluvium *Emeralds *Espers *Helena Espvall *Fuck Buttons *Fursaxa *The Futurians *Gescom *Mathias Grassow *Growing *Grouper *Hafler Trio *Keiji Haino *Hammock *Robert Hampson *Tom Heasley *Tim Hecker *Christoph Heemann *Catherine Christer Hennix *If Thousands *Tetsu Inoue *Rafael Anton Irisarri *Jane *Jesu *Khanate *Khlyst *Thomas Köner *Labradford *Landing *Liars *Loscil *Machinefabriek *Maeror Tri *Main *Stephan Mathieu *Melvins *Merzbow *Mirror *Moss *Alexi Murdoch *Nadja *Natural Snow Buildings *Jim O'Rourke *Pauline Oliveros *Om *Oneohtrix Point Never *Ou Où *Ox *Charlemagne Palestine *Phill Niblock *Eliane Radigue *The Resonance Association *Trent Reznor *Robert Rich *Atticus Ross *Esa Ruoho *Stars of the Lid *Stars Over Foy *Sunn O))) *Syrinx *Tangerine Dream *Teeth of Lions Rule the Divine *The Telescopes *Theatre of Eternal Music *This Will Destroy You *Thrones *Troum *Mirko Uhlig *Yoshi Wada *Michael Waller *Wapstan *Klaus Wiese *Steven Wilson *Windy & Carl *Yellow Swans *La Monte Young ==References== Drone Music
title: List of drone artists
